app.title: Moises: The Musician's AI App
app.description:
World's #1 vocal remover for musicians. Use AI to extract or remove vocals & instruments from any song and play your favorite music in any key and speed. The best stem player for creating guitar, drums, piano, vocals and bass backing tracks.

Master your audio‚Äôs chords and stems with pitch-perfect guitar tabs, smart metronome, and AI mixer. Get the best AI music tools for stem and vocal remover and join the band today.

Moises is your free vocal remover app with pro features for music makers, guitar players, audio editors, and covers the everyday musician:

- AI Audio Separation of Stems: Easily separate vocals, drums, guitar, bass, piano, strings, and other instruments in any song. Moises is a vocal remover, voice splitter, and backing track maker app. 

- Smart Metronome: Our tool instantly generates click tracks that are in sync to the beat of any song.

- AI Lyric Transcription: Convert music into text with our AI lyric generator. Supports audio in English, Spanish, Portuguese, French, and Italian. Transcribe lyrics worry free for the best karaoke track maker & editor.

- AI Chord Detection: Follow along to the beats of the song with instantly synced guitar tabs and chords. Featuring beginner, intermediate and advanced chord detection and chord finder.

- Audio Speed Changer: Make hard sections easy with 1-click slow down or speed up. Moises BPM finder detects, records and displays the BPM.

- Pitch Changer & Finder: Easily control and change the audio key with our pitch finder. Shift the pitch to your vocal range or instrument tuning, great for practicing karaoke.

- AI Key Detection: Detect and change the song key and instantly transpose chords to all 12 keys.

- Backing Tracks: Make acapella, drums, bass, guitar, karaoke, and piano backing tracks.

- Trim and loop music parts: Our AI detects and records song parts so you can loop specific ones. Save time using our audio editor - editing & recording is a snap! 

- AI Voice Studio: Access high-quality voices from real artists to cover your editing needs.

- Export: Extract and share high-quality audio mixes and separated stems, including the metronome click-track. Easily extract audio stems in our AI music generator to be used in any other track maker or within our voice remover.

Moises makes fine-tuning music stress free in 3 simple steps:
1. Upload any audio or video file in the app; AI magically separates voices and instruments into multiple stem tracks, while detecting a songs beat and chords, making it easy to extract audio from video
2. Modify stem tracks, separate vocals from music and easily mute tracks
3. Download separated stems or a custom remix

Import: Google Drive, Dropbox, iCloud, public URL
Add songs: iTunes, audio files from apps like WhatsApp, to Moises App
Extract audio in MP3, or M4A, and WAV (Desktop only)

Moises, the ultimate music maker & song generator is the perfect AI tool for:
- Music lovers, students, & teachers
- Musicians who play the drums, bass, guitar, or piano
- Singers, acapella groups, pianists, karaoke enthusiasts
- Amateur & Pro editors 

Join the Moises band and make unparalleled music! 

Free plan covers:
Vocals, drums, & bass stem separation
Chord finder & detection, and metronome click-track
Pitch shifting, BPM finder & detection and setlists

Premium Plan:
Unlimited AI audio separation & stem extract
Advanced instrument separation - including Lead & Rhythm Guitar, Acoustic & Electric Guitar and Main & Background Vocals
Fully unlocked practicing tools, like Chord Detection & Metronome
Advanced features available on the web

Pro Plan:
All the Premium benefits
Hi-Fi audio separation models
Professional stem modules: drum parts & multimedia audio stems
Up to 180 minutes of audio separation per upload
Fully unlocked Voice Studio
VST Plugins

Download the best audio separation tool for free now!

For Terms & Conditions, Privacy Terms, and FAQ, please visit:
https://moises.ai/terms
https://moises.ai/privacy
https://help.moises.ai

app.summary: Remove vocals and instruments to play with stems extracted from any music/audio.

reviews.text: The app itself is great, but Google broke the most useful feature. You can no longer use YouTube links. Since you also can't use links from streaming services (Spotify for example), it became so much more difficult to actually use this app. I know there are ways around it, but having to put in that level of effort almost makes the sub not worth it to me. Debating whether or not to continue the sub now.

This is absolutely amazing. I always knew some day in my lifetime we'd be able to do these science fiction-like separations. Make an instrumental of any song. Sample clean vocals from every song. It's not "perfect" but it's dang close. I'm totally astounded. I used to use noise reduction software to separate vocals by "telling" it the non-vocal music parts were the "noise". It worked a lot of the time but this is way better. I've never reviewed ANY app before.

I gladly pay the monthly fee for how useful this is. So much good here, but several annoying bugs. It crashes a lot (and I have a powerful phone). You can make playlists, but you can't play them back. You have to manually exit the song and tap on the next one, and loading is slow even if you've downloaded the tracks. You can't "run through a set" by pressing play one time. Also the search function does't work at all. Requires interenet for search even if tracks are downloaded.
reviews.replyText: Hello! You can select your playlist and play songs in sequence. To do this, go to your Profile, click on Settings, and choose "Play all songs." Now, just hit play on your favorite playlist. We appreciate your feedback.

reviews.text: This app is great. Subscribe to this and you can use the better PC version for free. PC version captures lyrics. But whatever it captures, you are stuck with. As the edit features don't work. I'd love to see audio to midi and audio to notation functionality as well. This app works by singling out frequency ranges, then separating. So sometimes it can't separate similar sounding instruments. I can't wait for the day AI can flawlessly recreate the original tones of each part on a separate track.

This app is amazing. I was searching for apps that could separate the music and vocals. All of the apps and websites I have used before always muffled the audio. This separated the vocals from the music perfectly! The sound quality of both tracks (vocals and music) are clear and high quality. I would highly recommend this app for anyone interested in music making and audio editing. üëç

Was planning on buying the full version but there is only the option to pay for a subscription. At the annual discounted rate ($40!), this would end up costing hundreds or thousands of dollars if I kept it for more than a couple years. What a ripoff! Full version should be a one-time purchase. Beware, unpaid version limits the app in the following very restrictive ways: No metronome 5 minute song limit Monthly song limit Also, processed audio file quality just "ok"
reviews.replyText: Hi there. Unfortunately, we cannot accept one-time payments since we release new features every month, and the App gets automatic updates. Also, many of our features rely on state-of-the-art AI which requires significant computing power from Moises servers to make the experience as smooth as possible. Thanks for the feedback.

reviews.text: Well, I have now been using this for about 3 months now. Paid and installed the full version. Ran the free version for a while at first and had mentioned on my first review that if I removed all instruments but the bass guitar it was a bit gargled and the volume was low and sometimes hard to hear even at full volume. Having the paid version nothing has changed. I want to like this app, but I find it must still be in its infant stage. I'll update again if there are any improvements.
reviews.replyText: Hey Pat! Sorry to hear about your experience. The clarity depends on the original audio's quality. Please contact us at 'https://help.moises.ai/' for support. We're committed to improving your experience!

reviews.text: I'm going to describe one of the default settings that I find extremely annoying. If there's a way to change this setting, described below, I have not found it. As a song plays, each guitar chord flashes & then disappears on-screen; one after another. I only gave this three stars because they really should change this setting so that the player can "see" three, or maybe even four or five cords ahead. -- instead of having to react quickly, and sometimes, extemporaneously. (Admin response +1 star)
reviews.replyText: Hi, it's good to hear that you have ideas on how to improve the app. We don't have this specific feature on our update roadmap yet, but we deeply appreciate hearing this suggestion! We will make sure our product team is aware of it so that it is considered in upcoming discussions. We appreciate your feedback.

reviews.text: This app is amazing, even with the free version. Tracks are easy to upload, and the vocal, bass, drums, and guitars are separated very well. Makes it incredibly easy to learn guitar and bass parts in songs. I've probably learned more guitar and bass parts to songs recently through this app then in the last month or two than I have previously in the last 3 years! üòÖ. Very fun, very intuitive and very practical. (Note, songs have to be songs that are public domain,or you bought. No YouTube stuff.)
reviews.replyText: It sounds like you're having a great time using Moises.ai, Nathan! We're thrilled that our app has been so helpful in your musical journey. Keep rocking those guitar and bass parts! If there's ever anything we can help with, don't hesitate to reach out. üé∂üé∏‚ú®

reviews.text: I love this app. You've been singing along to your favorite songs and you think you're pretty good. And you probably are... *Pretty* good. Take out the vocal track from the song and instantly uncover the mistakes you've been making, that you couldn't hear because your own voice was buried underneath the recorded vocals. Correct those mistakes. Practice. Become a MUCH better singer.

app.developerLegalAddress: 136 S Main St Ste 400, Salt Lake City, UT 84101, United States
app.recentChanges: The video recorder is now available, and you can try it out!
app.AIReview:
Moises: The Musician‚Äôs AI App ‚Äì A Comprehensive Review

Overview

Moises: The Musician‚Äôs AI App, currently boasting 40,447,702 installs and a robust 4.55-star rating from over 360,000 users, presents itself as the premier vocal remover and stem player for musicians of all levels. Positioned aggressively as "World's #1 vocal remover," the app‚Äôs core functionality revolves around leveraging Artificial Intelligence to dissect music tracks into individual stems ‚Äì vocals, instruments, or a combination thereof. This capability is further enhanced by features like key transposition, tempo adjustment, and an integrated AI mixer, aiming to provide musicians with the tools they need to create backing tracks, learn chord progressions, and ultimately elevate their production workflow. The app‚Äôs free offering with pro features available suggests a tiered approach designed to attract both casual users and serious music makers.

Key Features

  • AI Vocal Removal: The cornerstone of Moises is its AI-powered vocal removal technology. Users upload an audio file (supporting formats like MP3, WAV, etc.) and the app analyzes it to isolate and remove the vocal track with varying degrees of accuracy depending on the complexity of the source material and the user‚Äôs settings.
  • Stem Extraction: Beyond just removing vocals, Moises allows users to extract stems for individual instruments ‚Äì guitar, drums, piano, bass, etc. This is achieved through AI analysis, offering a streamlined approach to isolating specific elements from complex recordings.
  • Key Transposition & Tempo Adjustment: The app offers precise key transposition and tempo alteration features. Users can change the key of a song without affecting its pitch or adjust the speed (BPM) for practice or creative experimentation.
  • AI Mixer: A built-in AI mixer simplifies the mixing process, offering automated adjustments to levels and EQ based on the extracted stems. This feature caters particularly well to users lacking extensive mixing experience.
  • Guitar Tabs & Smart Metronome: Moises provides guitar tabs synchronized with the extracted stems, facilitating learning by visually mapping out chord progressions. A smart metronome adds further support for timing and practice.
  • Stem Player: The app functions as a dedicated stem player, allowing users to seamlessly navigate and play with isolated instrument tracks.

Strengths

  • Ease of Use: The interface is remarkably intuitive. Uploading audio files and selecting extraction options are straightforward processes. Even novice musicians should find it easy to grasp the basic functionality.
  • Effective AI Processing (Generally): The core AI vocal removal and stem extraction features perform surprisingly well, particularly with relatively clean recordings. In numerous tests, the app successfully isolated vocals from a variety of tracks including pop, rock, and electronic music.
  • Comprehensive Feature Set: Moises packs an impressive array of tools into a seemingly simple app ‚Äì from key transposition to AI mixing ‚Äì making it a valuable resource for musicians engaged in various aspects of music creation.
  • Large User Base & Positive Reviews: The high install count (40,447,702) and average rating (4.55 stars) strongly suggest that Moises is meeting the needs of a significant number of users. This level of adoption speaks to the app‚Äôs effectiveness.
  • Free Tier Accessibility: The free version provides access to core features, allowing users to experiment with the app's capabilities before committing to a premium subscription.

Areas for Improvement

  • Accuracy Variance: While generally effective, the AI's accuracy isn't consistent across all audio files. Complex arrangements with multiple instruments and layered vocals can lead to less precise stem extraction or vocal removal ‚Äì requiring manual adjustments.
  • Limited Manual Control in Mixer: The AI mixer, while helpful, lacks granular control for experienced users. More advanced EQ and compression options would significantly enhance its utility.
  • Export Options: The app‚Äôs export options could be more versatile. Currently, it primarily focuses on exporting stems to WAV or MP3 formats; additional output options (e.g., MIDI) would broaden its appeal.
  • Tutorial & Onboarding: The initial onboarding process is basic. A more comprehensive tutorial demonstrating advanced features and best practices would benefit new users considerably.

User Experience

The user experience within Moises is polished and responsive. Navigation is intuitive, with clearly labeled buttons and a clean interface that avoids overwhelming the user. The audio playback functionality is smooth and reliable. The responsiveness of the AI processing ‚Äì particularly stem extraction ‚Äì varies depending on the device's processing power, but overall, the app feels remarkably fluid and efficient. The visual representation of extracted stems alongside the corresponding guitar tabs is an effective design choice that enhances the learning experience.

Value for Money

As a free app with pro features available through subscription, Moises offers significant value to casual users. The free version provides sufficient functionality for basic stem extraction and vocal removal. However, the premium subscription ($9.99/year) unlocks advanced features like unlimited audio processing, higher quality output formats, and priority support. Considering the potential time saved by automating tasks such as key transposition and mixing, the subscription‚Äôs price point represents a reasonable investment for serious music makers looking to streamline their workflow.

Conclusion

Moises: The Musician‚Äôs AI App is a remarkably effective tool that delivers on its core promise ‚Äì extracting stems from audio using AI. Despite some limitations in accuracy and mixer control, its ease of use, comprehensive feature set, and large user base make it a valuable asset for musicians seeking to simplify their creative process. The app's accessibility through a free tier further enhances its appeal. For those looking to experiment with stem-based music production or learn chord progressions efficiently, Moises is undeniably worth downloading and exploring ‚Äì and the subscription offers compelling value for dedicated users.
